prod_description: For this captivating collection, we found infinite inspiration in all our most-loved scenes from Harry Potter ... and then added a dash of our own Muggle magic.
Wi-Fi, Upgraded, Super-Thin,1500Pa Strong Suction, Touch-Control Panel, 6ft Boundary Strips, Quiet, Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum,Cleans Hard Floors to Medium-Pile Carpets.
